duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide high quality customer service and support to internal and external groups.
Issue management and resolution for technical defects, enhancements, and regular maintenance of Payroll Operations/Processing teams.
Maintenance and monitoring of system interfaces such as GL Postings, Stock, Benefits, and Banking.
Participation in cross-functional testing, creating scenarios, executing test cases, and moving changes to production.
Daily support of SAP HR monitoring, testing, and performance issues.
Identification, analysis, research, and resolution of errors and discrepancies between internal HR/Employee systems and the payroll system.
Ensuring all documentation is properly updated and supported according to company policies, procedures, regulatory practices, and legal requirements.
Supporting global peers, acting as a back-up or additional resource for audits, error handling, and payroll processing in different regions.
Handling of confidential data and understanding of responsibility.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Statistics, Software Engineering, Computer Science, or related field and/or at least 5 years of relevant experience.
